title: Mobile Microlearning Design for Fitness Knowledge Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of exercise physiology and energy metabolism concepts
context.additional_context: Learners access content on-the-go via mobile devices, engaging in social media-based discussions and case-based project work

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to accurately explain physiological mechanisms of aerobic/anaerobic energy systems by over 80%
Acquisition of the ability to create concept maps analyzing energy consumption patterns during actual physical activities
Development of the ability to execute projects applying scientific principles when establishing fitness plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
